fields.summary: iOS: Modules: Unlicensed user can use modules with projects created by licensed user

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Note:*
* Bug still occurs in 1.8.2 and 2.0.0.GA
* Did not test on Rhino.

*Steps to reproduce:*
1. Login to studio as a licensed user
2. Create a new project
3. Logout and login as an unlicensed user
4. Add modules to the project created in step 2
5. Compile project and run

*Actual Result:*
An unlicensed user can just take a project from a licensed user and use all the modules

*Expected Result:*
Should not allow user to share licensed projects
fields.summary: Android: Modules: Unlicensed user can use modules with projects created by licensed user
